Package gui

Class OpponentSelectorScreen

java.lang.Object
gui.OpponentSelectorScreen
public class OpponentSelectorScreen extends Object
This is the OpponentSelectorScreen. This screen provides 3 opponent teams to choose from. When a team is clicked, the players in that team and their stats are shown to the player.
Author:
Yunu Cho, Kush Desai

    • btnEvent

      public void btnEvent(JLabel teamName, JLabel player1, JLabel player2, JLabel player3, JLabel player4, JLabel player5, int index)
      Sets the Label text when a JButton is pressed, displaying the information of an Athlete that is linked to its corresponding JButton.
      Parameters:
      teamName - the name of the opposing Team
      player1 - label that will be set to display the information of the opposing Athlete of the Point Guard position
      player2 - label that will be set to display the information of the opposing Athlete of the Shooting Guard position
      player3 - label that will be set to display the information of the opposing Athlete of the Small Forward position
      player4 - label that will be set to display the information of the opposing Athlete of the Power Forward position
      player5 - label that will be set to display the information of the opposing Athlete of the Center position
      index - index of the opposing Team that has been selected
